rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with ample space and Vastu-compliant north-west entrance.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: foyer leading to living area; designed with north-east direction for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space adjoining the kitchen. Vastu-compliant south-east placement encourages activity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Integrated open-plan kitchen adjacent to the living area; placed in the north-west direction for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet study and reading space located on the south-east side of the ground floor to align with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom for the owners placed in the north-west direction ensuring calm and restful energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed with south-east alignment promoting comfort and hospitality.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small service area located in the north-west direction for convenience.

openings.name: Windows in Living Room and Kitchen

notes: This floor plan incorporates an industrial-style duplex design with four bedrooms (including master bedroom), open-plan living and kitchen areas, a dedicated library, two-car garage, and adheres to Vastu principles. Consider local building norms for structural safety and zoning regulations.
